origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'EconomicDataAPI.get_rural_credit_data', 'description': 'This function provides monthly credit issuance data for rural areas for a specified year.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'region', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The region for which data is requested, e.g., all, specific_province.'}, {'name': 'year', 'type': 'NUMBER', 'description': 'The year for which the data is requested.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'creditData', 'description': 'The monthly credit issuance data for the specified year.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 EconomicDataAPI.get_rural_credit_data, 它的参数输入如下: 'region'是'all', 'year'是'2024'.
